column4: hi all.  can somoene give me a hand installing OpenTracker under Ubuntu?
i've never used it. Have you checked the forums?
yea, it's not much help.  there is lots of info on how the pirate bay uses it.
let me see what I can pull up
ok, thanks.  I'm going to see if I can shed some light on this MTU issue seeing as I'm a cable monkey
do you need to know how to install it, or configure it?
lol, I' stayed in network planning
you're the guy that even I can't hid from
maybe I'll send him over to "bay netowrks"
I need to know how to install/configure it
basiclly I don't want my little server to get hammered with a PHP baised tracker.  I tried XBT, and it sucked
it's a "pet project" before I let my flash programmer loose on the site
loser:  try 1400 first, then work up till it gets flakey.  allwyas start smalll
did you get the PM from me?
no worries, I'm bad @ the programming stuff.  (and yes, I got your PM, and sent 2 in return.  just join #jeeves)
